website_summaries.verdict: Mid-priced item of larger-than-average size with some known deficits.
pros: Work surface is 24% larger than standard board
Sturdy steel with built-in iron rest
cons: Height adjustment mechanism can be difficult to manipulate
Some complaints about pad quality and durability

customer_reviews.title: Uniform ironing
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for ironing my husband's uniforms for work. Lots of space to get a bigger area done at once to make the chore go a little faster. I also quilt so I am able to iron my fabric pieces more together at once or a bigger area of a bigger piece of fabric at once.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.  Does not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ironing board in March 2013. The cover provided with the board was inadequate -- foam pad with a thin cloth cover. I had to purchase a thicker pad & cover to use the board. Though I purchased a thicker pad & cover, the ironing board is now rusted (I use the steam setting for most ironing). Also, the latch that allows you to open & fold down the legs no longer works, so this board takes up a lot of space when I'm not using it! I would not purchase this again as I feel I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Croknitgirl

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product that is clearly well made. The one mechanism is a little tricky to get used to at first and requires some strong pulling, but I don't have any qualms with the quality. The fabric does say "assembled in Mexico of fabric made in the U.S.A," and there are no markings on the frame, nor was any packaging included to verify if it was made in the USA. However, the craftsmanship does seem top quality (definitely not from China), and given that Homz seems to pride themselves on being a US manufacturer, I tend to think that it was, I just can't verify for certain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ironing Board
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, substantial ironing board. I'm fairly tall and this board is high enough so that I don't have to bend over while I am ironing. I run the cord through the iron holder which helps to keep the cord out of the way. The board is wide so that makes it easier to iron large items. I sew and this board accommodates the material. I just wish I had a place where I could leave it up all of the time. The board is a bit heavy but I understand that for the size and stability that is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: SheShe10

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but good. Width makes quick work of big clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to iron more than half my shirt at a time. I wear XXL shirts, and have found regular ironing boards usually require three repositionings to get full coverage. With this board, I can do left-side, right-side. A hefty one for sure, but the surface reflects heat back up into the fabric nicely. I'm able to get a good crease. A foot fell off in shipping, but I contacted the manufacturer, and they sent a replacement part immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hepworth

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2 months and done.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was relatively happy with this ironing board. I lived with the mesh top giving me an uneven ironing surface, though I didn't love it. But seriously. It's an ironing board. Just deal with it. Until this morning when I put my hand on the board and it collapsed because a weld holding the brace to the legs snapped. Now there is just a useless piece of steel in my house that I need to deal with. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: The bottom of the ironing board became very rusty after ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the ironing board became very rusty after 2 years. The ironing board was in the bedroom closet when not in use, which was not humid at all. I don't understand why it is so rusty. Shreds of rust kept falling on the floor during ironing.
customer_reviews.author: PollyG

customer_reviews.title: Good ironing board for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this ironing board and would recommend to anyone looking to purchase a new one. It is well made, it looks nice, and I like the holder for the iron. It gives me much more room then my old ironing board. It is also wider which is nice. The only thing I will say is the shelf that has the dark blue shirt folded on it is extremely flimsy and can probably only hold the weight of that one shirt without being to bend down. For the price you can't go wrong and will be pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Montanacountry68

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews. I was warned properly. First, I didn't expect it to be so wide. It is also super heavy duty. But, I like that. The main issue is the ironing pad which is not good quality. We will see how it holds up but I think the other reviewers said it all about the cover. As for the construction, I really like this item. I hate flimsy wobbly things.
customer_reviews.author: Soberyogi

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Although I have had this board for over a year, it has only been used about a dozen times - we were living overseas and the board was used only when I returned home for a visit. I hate this board. I couldn't get a decent pad that would fit it's peculiar size, so I made one. Set it up this morning and the weld snapped on the underside of the board. Now it will not collapse. I will drag it to the sidewalk tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ironing board
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted with the reviews regarding this product and even more excited when it arrived. The features it has are great and it raises even higher than expected. I need the lower level for pressing quilting projects and the wider top is excellent for that. I chose this product because it has four feet and that stablizes it. All levels are easy to use, easy to lower and raise. The shipping was right on time with no damage to the product. This is the first time I have had to replace an ironing board in 20+ years, am expecting this one to last that long as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I liked that the ironing board is sturdy tall and wide ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the ironing board is sturdy tall and wide it was a little hard to release the handle to collapse but that could have been just me. it was a nice size to iron fabric on the iron rest held the iron well. I would give the ironing board a five star if it had even a decent cover and pad. which it does not. I would rate the cover and pad a 1 to 2 it is really flimsy. I put a good pad under and used the cover and it works. I don't understand why such a good board has such a bad cover and pad.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Makes ironing fun (or just better than it has been)
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would be genuinely excited about an ironing board...either I am turning into the most boring person on Earth, or this is the best ironing board ever. I prefer to believe the latter. The extra large size makes it a breeze to iron larger items like maxi-dresses, but it folds up to fit in even small spaces like between my washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: The best I have every used.
customer_reviews.text: Best ironing board I have purchased in forty-five years. Just the right size. I couldn't iron properly on the narrow boards. Love the wire shelf below and the bulit-on iron rest that doesn't use any of the surface space. Stability was always a problem with the two-bar shaped legs. The 4 leg design makes this ironing board very stable. I sew, among other things, and this a great surface to accomplish my projects. It is also a good value for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: the cover is too thin and can't be changed
customer_reviews.text: I thought buying a "quality board would be a good idea. What a wast of money. The cover that comes with it is so thin that when I iron darker clothing the pattern of the metal grin of the board ends up on my clothing. So I spent more $ to buy a better thicker cover. But the built in iron rest is so close to the board that there's no room to maneuver the new pad onto the board. If you have nay dark cloths that you iron do NOT get this board as it will ruin your dark cloths cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Hafina

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This ironing board was missing parts and did not have the clothes hanger underneath, as shown in the description. We found a much better version of this ironing board for only $37. with much better padding up top at Costco.
customer_reviews.author: TD Karantsalis

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I kept this board even though it is wider than what I am use to because it seemed so study. Now that I can no longer return it the legs will no longer lock into place. As soon as any weight is put on the board it falls/folds to the floor. Now need to replace my iron as well! Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kim K

customer_reviews.title: a really good ironing board! super strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It has a terrific wide surface, and is very nice and heavy. It also has a really handy shelf to hold ironed garment. The only problem is the bit that keeps the legs in place oce the board is open slips out of place and I have to fiddle with it whenever I set it up. That being said, the mild inconvenience of a few extra minutes setting up is worth it! It is such a darn good ironing board on all other counts I'm willing to put up with it.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy replacement board.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really sturdy board. I did take the iron rest and bottom rack off. The bottom rack is flimsy anyway. Not sure what it would even hold. I like to keep my board up when sewing or quilting and my animals and kids had knocked the old board over allot. This one holds its own.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: Big disappointment. Not Sturdy and the surface is bent. The shelf doesn't sit flat. The felt under the cover wasn't cut evenly so many areas don't have padding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seems sturdy and works as i expect it too
customer_reviews.text: its an ironing board, seems sturdy and works as i expect it too, Padding is thin, yes, but that is normal. My grandmother always stuffed hers with old fabric anyway. The BOARD is good, only thing was there were only 2 foot caps instead of 4. i just wrapped it in tape and since i have carpet , it's a small fix. Just hope it can last years like grandmother's old board.
customer_reviews.author: A. T. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Cheap build quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but I wanted to warn others. This board looks and sounds great but in real life it has a super cheap build quality. The legs aren't even so it rocks by almost an inch. The top ironing board surface is made from a super flimsy metal that you can litterally bend with your fingers (mine arrived bent out of shape so I had to push it back into shape). I don't know if they changed the materials recently since it has so many good reviews, but at this point I'd look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ironing Board
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been married almost thirty years. She as been ironing on a very old ironing board long before we were married. I have, on too many occasions to count, tried to purchase her a new ironing board. Finally when her old one was literally falling apart and she allowed me to purchase this one for her. It is nothing short of fantastic. the top is wider than the old one, therefore her ironing time is shortened and it easier to move around than the old one. I can highly recommend this ironing system!
customer_reviews.author: LugersandSwords

customer_reviews.title: This ironing board is sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This ironing board is sturdy and well made. The extra width makes it perfect for crafters and quilters but is also good for everyday ironing. I used some quilt batting to add to the padding before I put the cover on to supplement the rather thin pad that came with it. Haven't used the tray underneath but the iron rest is quite handy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mummum

customer_reviews.title: Love it, sturdy and as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and put down with plenty of height settings. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Allison McGue

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it's safer to use too
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about a new ironing board? It's bigger than my old one and so much sturdier. I quilt and it is exactly what I needed and wanted! I love it and it's safer to use too. Even makes my household ironing easier too. I love this board....it's just great!
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this product less than one star ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product less than one star I would. I took the ironing board out of the box, tried to stand it up and it collapsed. pieces fell off. It would not go into a normal flattened position. Even if all of that had not happened, there was barely any padding at all. The iron rest was very thin and would not support the weight of an iron. The storage tray below was also very flimsy and would not hold much weight. This was a very cheaply made item, and certainly not worth the price charged.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Great ironing board, but too wide at the top, and rack underneath a bit cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: The tip of the board is too wide for my taste (I prefer a narrow tip to get into the little shapes on my small clothes and when I sew), and sometimes the rack below gets in the way, causing wrinkles in what I have already pressed, but the ironing board is sturdy, well made, had a nice surface, and is better than any of the cheap ironing boards I have previously owned.
customer_reviews.author: A. Black

customer_reviews.title: ... is more of a commercial ironing board my wife hated it at first but now she's learned to love ...
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a commercial ironing board my wife hated it at first but now she's learned to love it because it's very big and you can do multiple things with it and it's very stable that's why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth williams

customer_reviews.title: Thought this would be perfect
customer_reviews.text: Thought this ironing board would be perfect but after only a few uses something broke and it would no longer stay standing :( My husband came to the rescue and did something to make it work but I was vert disappointed that it broke so quickly. Sorry but not a happy camper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele T. Toniatti

customer_reviews.title: Stable ironing board perfect for my sewing room.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the wide-body board I have been looking for. I have tried others and ended up sending them to the metal recyclers. The legs are stable, absolutely no wobbles. I really don't need the rack under it for folded ironing, so will probably remove it, as some items get caught in it. I enthusiastically recommend this board.
customer_reviews.author: Spud's PlaceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: If you sew or quilt, you need this ironing board
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a new ironing board for my quilt room and I love this one. It's 18" wide which is great for pressing lengths of fabric. The design of the legs makes it very sturdy. The pad is a bit thin so I put a layer of quilt batting under the cover and it's perfect. The price is great for an ironing board of this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Pressing
customer_reviews.text: I bought an ironing board, that looked like this, 27 years ago. This board seems to be sturdy but not as much as the older one and It is not as heavy. There are some things that don't improve with age. I am satisfied with my choice though.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: I mean - it's an ironing board
customer_reviews.text: Does everything you need and has a lot of room for clothes. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because it's VERY large (that's what she said...ohhh). No, but really, it's a great ironing board, it's just large and takes up space in the closet. Other than this, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: pdrama

customer_reviews.title: Love this, no more tipping and a solid place ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this, no more tipping and a solid place to put my iron. The wider width gives me plenty of room when ironing quilt tops.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: which is slightly annoying.
customer_reviews.text: The padding is not that thick so sometimes you can see the structure of the metal grid imprinted on the clothing right after you take it off the board. It's not visible when you wear it but still. Also, the board isn't 100% perfectly flat, there are tiny bumps where the legs attach to the top, which is slightly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina Netolicka

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The ironing board, fell apart less than a year after buying it. The ironing pad is non-existent on the board, I had to supplement the pad with a blanket and a towel. It's in my garage waiting to be trashed.
customer_reviews.author: Seun

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This board is great. Tall and sturdy. The cover is too thin so I will get another one. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ucfanshan

customer_reviews.title: So sturdy and makes it easier!
customer_reviews.text: This is exceptionally well made. Easy to open and close, and the adjustable height makes it capable of expanding taller than I'm used to but love it! Had no idea how ironing on a little taller surface made such a difference . I also love the width of the board. Makes a not-so-fun job much easier!
customer_reviews.author: FMKitties

customer_reviews.title: Nice & sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the ironing board very well - nice & stable. I love that it is wider and has the iron holder on the end. The reason for the 4 stars instead of 5 is because the pad that came on it is way too thin. I purchased a separate pad & put it on right away.
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after 1.5 years - but good service / support
customer_reviews.text: Consistent with other reviews, we have also found that this ironing board is rusted out at the bottom, and doesn't close properly after ~1.5 years of home use approximately 1x per week. Update: we were pleased that the manufacturer stood behind the product with a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Ironing Board
customer_reviews.text: Good solid ironing board, it is adjustable for any height you wish to iron' The only feature I feel could be better is the Ironing board cover. The cover that comes with the unit is just a little too thin. I will buy a thicker cover.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad S.

customer_reviews.title: The padding is meager at best.
customer_reviews.text: I found it hard to maneuver and after using it one time, the cover has a hole in it. The padding is meager at best.
customer_reviews.author: Katy G.

customer_reviews.title: The wider width of the board makes me act like a profesional when ironing
customer_reviews.text: Ironing is now a dream. The wider width of the board makes me act like a profesional when ironing.
customer_reviews.author: RuthH20171Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, almost did not order because of reviews
customer_reviews.text: I love it, almost did not order because of reviews. The cover is thin but I put in a heavy batting under neath and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Morales

customer_reviews.title: and has good points and not so good
customer_reviews.text: It has taken some getting used to, and has good points and not so good. It is stable and I like that it is wider than most ironing boards. However, the padding is not so good- I will have to sew a thicker pad and a cover to fit the added thickness. I do not see a better ironing board for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! I love the large board because i am ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday and used it for the first time. Fantastic! I love the large board because i am able to iron shirts without lots of turns. The folding rack on the bottom is great also!
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty ironing board
customer_reviews.text: I don't iron very often, but this is a very nice ironing board. It has heavy duty legs that provide a very stable base - this board does not rock around while you use it. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Wife LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my sewing and crafting wife. It's not super expensive and does everything she wants it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mizzou44

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Yes, you do need to buy a good quality cover to go over the one that comes with this item.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Yes, you do need to buy a good quality cover to go over the one that comes with this item.
customer_reviews.author: The Flemings

customer_reviews.title: I like the shelf below the board for temporary storage
customer_reviews.text: The board is large and makes it so much easier when ironing table clothes, I like the shelf below the board for temporary storage. This is amazing light for the size and stores flat.
customer_reviews.author: A Georgia Girl

customer_reviews.title: I like this board because I can also hang items off ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this board because I can also hang items off it so it doubles as drying rack. I may purchase an additional pad in the future because it seems thinner than expected but it is suits my needs for right now.
customer_reviews.author: LALife

customer_reviews.title: Homz Professional Ironing System
customer_reviews.text: VERY pricey but oh so nice in every other way including size and durability. Ironing is a pleasure again.
customer_reviews.author: The Clean Veganista

customer_reviews.title: BIG, SUPPLE, BUT HEAVY.
customer_reviews.text: Big and sufficient in surface area, but clunky and very heavy! BUT it does the job that it was made for, which is, allowing you to iron your clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Chuka U. Ikokwu

customer_reviews.title: Nice and wide to you can iron without moving the clothes around alot.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy height adjustment. But I found the same board under the Good Housekeeping brand at Wal-Mart for $5.00 bucks less but I saved on taxes and free shipping so it was a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but needs better pad
customer_reviews.text: Works well but had to buy extra pad so I did not get imprint of grid through clothes.
customer_reviews.author: JPSilver

customer_reviews.title: misleading dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: the dimensions are just for the board. the actual product with legs folded up is way too big for any normal closet/cupboard. immediately returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions and I can't open it. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: No instructions and I can't open it. It was scratched and missing one of the caps, on the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Love it. BUT
customer_reviews.text: Love it. BUT, had to buy some foam, cut to shape, and put under pad. Padding was awful, and made ironing to hard, and left creases in the items I tried to iron. Everything else is fine. Thanks. Kipper Loveland
customer_reviews.author: Kipper Loveland

customer_reviews.title: Loads of features, a little unstable
customer_reviews.text: Good ironing board although not as stable as they claim, three legs probably wobble less than this four legged model.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, very sturdy, well made ironing board. A bit wide at the front so getting clothing around the front end doesn't work. But it makes me use my ham and seam roll more.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Pevensie

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but I wouldn't pay 70 bucks for it again
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but I wouldn't pay 70 bucks for it again. But should be the last ironing board I ever buy
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: solid, well made, my only issue is that ...
customer_reviews.text: solid, well made, my only issue is that it's rather heavy and cumbersome. for others this might not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Olga G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy ironing board. Great price. Having trouble finding ironing board covers.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: HATE TO IRON GET THIS BOARD YOU WILL CHANGE YOUR MIND
customer_reviews.text: i iron only if I have no other choice before buying this ironing System. Get yourself a good iron and this board you will be pleasantly suprised.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne P

customer_reviews.title: I canot say enough good things about this
customer_reviews.text: This is so well made. Sturdy-does not wiggle. Large enough for curtains. Extra shlf underneath. I canot say enough good things about this...
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Malfunction during opening not smooth in 6 months legs bent and broke
customer_reviews.author: VELAZQUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Solid Ironing Board
customer_reviews.text: Very good ironing board. It's sturdy, wide, and solidly made. The cover it comes with is thin, that's why I rated it four stars not five.
customer_reviews.author: Gnerd

customer_reviews.title: Finally an ironing board worth owning!
customer_reviews.text: It is an ironing board for a lifetime! it is sturdy, it has a big surface. It is great for regular ironing as well as sewing projects that are bulky and awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Lollyj

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ironing board. A bit on the heavy and bulky side, but great for the actual job!
customer_reviews.author: Liquidbluerain

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my new ironing board. As a quilter, I wash and iron lots of fabric, and the extra width of this board makes the job easier. I was hesitant to but a new board, because the ones I've seen in the stores seem cheap and wobbly. The board I started married life with 40+ years ago is still going strong, but I really wanted a wider one. The new one is constructed like my tried and true one, and seems every bit as sturdy. I've made a new cover and pad for the old one, and it's going to my son's new home.
customer_reviews.author: Betty L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Worth my money, it's strong and has a lot of space when ironing, the shipment was very fast, thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: The grommet that joins the two legs in the middle is so sharp that I cut myself on it while ironing. I noticed there was blood on my slacks, and when I looked down, the sharp edge of the grommet had sliced my kneecap. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Django

customer_reviews.title: Great ironing board
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and the wider surface is a great assist for my quilting products. I would have given it 5 stars except that it did not come with the tray that was supposed to be attached to the legs.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The box was open upon delivery and there were two holes in the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Musser

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think I would like a large ironing board
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I would like a large ironing board, but this one is great. This ironing board is nice and heavy
customer_reviews.author: C. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is much sturdier than I thought! I did need to add a pad under the one it came with, but I didn't mind the board was so good!
customer_reviews.author: John Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Beats by far cheaper models that look the ...
customer_reviews.text: Well-made. Sturdy. Beats by far cheaper models that look the same.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Came with 2 missing rubber protective tips used on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with 2 missing rubber protective tips used on the ends of the legs. So far unable to figure out how to contact the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great work horse
customer_reviews.text: This product is very sturdy and well made; although, it is heavier than our previous ironing boards. Also, the standard board cover that we currently have did not fit this new ironing board.
customer_reviews.author: Ezequiel Montanez

customer_reviews.title: If you like Rust then you'll like this ironing board
customer_reviews.text: Well, it works fine but the bottom of the board is all rusted out after less than one year after purchase and weekly use.
customer_reviews.author: James Spencer

customer_reviews.title: garbage at any price
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Thoughtlessly designed and poorly made. Only one position, fully up. Does not extend or collapse smoothly. Shelf extension renders wide end of the board useless. Whoever designed this has never used an ironing board, whoever made it should stick to mass producing toothpicks. Buy ANYTHING else.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Best ironing board ever
customer_reviews.text: Best ironing board ever. Comes assembled and ready to go. Very sturdy base and extra wide ironing surface. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Faramarz Moeen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy on the back because it's taller than most boards. The rack underneath is a little weak.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Shortreed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent met all my needs. Heavy and stable the iron rest is super. Would be nice to have a thicker pad though.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The product itself was great. The Ironing pad is extremely thin
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was great. The Ironing pad is extremely thin. Not what I expected. Would have bought a Barbantia board if I could do it over.
customer_reviews.author: Sean A.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I got this ironing board recently. LOVE IT! It is very solid, comfortable to use and gives that feeling of the real quality of good product.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Multi-flawed product
customer_reviews.text: I'll give you three reasons to pass on this product right now. I would've if I'd known this before buying it: 1) the little metal tray on mine slants toward the floor, meaning things slide off it, making it useless 2) the pad that covers this is so thin on this that when you iron, you get an imprint on your clothes from the metal grate 3) because this is a non-standard size, you can't find a thinker pad to cover it Pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: The best ironing board I've owned. So pleased with it. Very durable and also has a wider ironing surface area. So glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Kwasi Gyeabour

customer_reviews.title: The cover was torn!
customer_reviews.text: I received the ironing board, with a torn cover! Everything else has been okay, and the board is sturdy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Richardson

customer_reviews.title: There are better wide boards out there
customer_reviews.text: Its OK. Nice wide board, crappy cover, lacks sufficient padding, I had to put a towel under it. The base is not as stable not as I needed or was hoping for. Wish I spent a little more and went for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: any

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, built like a tank and very comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: This is made of of sturdy, durable materials, is very stable, and the board is at an appropriate height for a small or tall person. Cloth material is thick and with enough grip to iron smoothly, without marks staying in your ironed clothes. Hold over 20 hangers easily on the side, and basket below below can hold a large amount of clothing. Folds easily and fits in any laundry closet (even a Boston laundry closet!).
customer_reviews.author: Vicente Sanavia

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE CHEAPEST BOARD EVER!! YOU WILL ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE CHEAPEST BOARD EVER !! YOU WILL NOT GET YOUR MONEYS WORTH. SENDING THIS BACK ON THE SAME DAY AS PURCHASED , VERY VERY DISAPOINTED IN THE FLIMSY QUALITY AND THE MESH SCREEN IS NOT EVEN VERY RIGID MEANING YOU CAN PUSH IT IN WITH YOU FINGERS. IM SO SICK AND TIRED OF A RACE TO THE BOTTOM LKE THIS WHERE YOU PAY MORE AND MORE OVER THE YEARS AND WE GET LESS AND LESS. KEEP THIS IRONING BOARD OUT OF MY HOUSE !
customer_reviews.author: Ruth M. Harbeson

customer_reviews.title: If I had 4 arms, I would buy 2
customer_reviews.text: I hate ironing. I love this ironing board. It's stable, wide, the cover is on tight. It does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Product not a described.
customer_reviews.text: Product picture and description include a linen rack which was not included upon delivery. Product rating would have been 5 star in stead of the one.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Best Ironing System I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a no nonsense ironing board. Super stable and quality built. Heavy sturdy legs for superior support. Extra wide also for ironing shirts. If I have to iron, I want it to be on this system!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sapienza

customer_reviews.title: Very bad and overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: The quality and durability of this product is very very low. This product is extremely overpriced. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Giron

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: way too big and difficult to open and close because of it's size.
customer_reviews.author: LeeLee

customer_reviews.title: Nice and wide which I like for my quilting projects
customer_reviews.text: Everything it claimed to be! Nice and wide which I like for my quilting projects. Better than any I could find in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Randi M. Daeger

customer_reviews.title: Oversized Ironing Board
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sturdy ironing board. My wife wanted one that was sturdy. Unfortunately for me, I ordered this one. When it arrived I realized it was an oversize board. None of my wife's ironing board covers would fit it and the front of the board did not fit my shirt sleeves when ironing. I just ordered the wrong board. However, I am willing to pay for a high quality standard size ironing board and I did not see one on the Amazon website.
customer_reviews.author: John D
